results.title: Combating Drug Resistance in Lung Cancer: Exploring the Synergistic Potential of Metformin and Cisplatin in a Novel Combination Therapy; A Systematic Review.
results.text_hl: This review investigates the potential of combining @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@Cis@@@) to overcome drug @<m>DISEASE_Disease_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060467 @@@resistance@@@ and enhance treatment efficacy.

results.title: Emerging pollutant metformin in water promotes the development of multiple-antibiotic resistance in Escherichia coli via chromosome mutagenesis.
results.text_hl: However, the contribution of the emerging pollutant @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in facilitating @DISEASE_Enterocolitis_Pseudomembranous @DISEASE_MESH:D004761 @@@antibiotic@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Disease_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060467 @@@resistance@@@ remains unclear.

results.text_hl: Furthermore, miR-152-3p-induced silencing of @GENE_DNMT1 @GENE_84350 @@@DNMT1@@@ was blocked by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, hence restraining MC activation and airway @<m>DISEASE_Disease_Resistance</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060467 @@@resistance@@@.

results.title: TP53 disruptive mutations lead to head and neck cancer treatment failure through inhibition of radiation-induced senescence.
